code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic j,
    input logic k,
    output logic Q
);

    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        case ({j, k})
            2'b00: Q <= Q;       // No change
            2'b01: Q <= 1'b0;    // Reset
            2'b10: Q <= 1'b1;    // Set
            2'b11: Q <= ~Q;      // Toggle
            default: Q <= Q;     // Default case for safety
        endcase
    end

endmodule
